title: Seeing in the Dark - Astronomy
description:
Author Timothy Ferris ("Seeing in the Dark") directs this film about the cosmos and stargazing. Included are images of deep space; and comments from various stargazers, among them former NFL player Robert Smith, space photographer Rob Gendler, author Stephen James O&#039;Meara ("Deep-Sky Companion") and Houston resident Barbara Wilson.

Another quality file brought to you by Djinniae!

Capture errors caused me to work for two days on fixing this file -- separating the video and audio, encoding each separately, muxing them together, finding where the audio loses synchronization, adding some small fraction of silence at that moment, muxing the files together, checking the lip synchronization, then going back to the audio, modifying it again, muxing again, and checking again, until it was correct.

Enjoy!
